text: Amanda Tapping (born 28 August 1965)Jo Storm, Approaching the Possible: The World of Stargate SG-1 (Toronto: ECW; London: Turnaround, 2007), p. 37 is an English-Canadian actress, producer and director. She is best known for portraying Samantha Carter in the TV series Stargate SG-1. She also played Helen Magnus in Sanctuary.Vincent Terrace, Internet Horror, Science Fiction and Fantasy Television Series, 1998-2013 (Jefferson, NC: McFarland & Company, Inc., Publishers, 2014), p. 175 Tapping was born in Rochford, Essex and moved to Ontario at age three. == References == ==Other websites== * * Category:1965 births Category:Actors from Essex Category:Actors from Toronto Category:Canadian television directors Category:Canadian television producers Category:Living people Category:Twin people from Canada
title: Amanda Tapping
